leadingComments.value: When user language is updated, rebuild local placeholder (translate if needed).

*
         * @method
         * @private
         * @name buildLocalPlaceholder
         * @description
         *   Builds the input placeholder, having in consideration if the field is
         *      required and if the label is only for the screen readers.
